Articles.Content: So I was wondering if anyone has come across any auto repair mods? I just landed an unmanned ship with 2 rovers attached and they both had 1 wheel pop. I would love to send a repair mission to Duna but my funds are currently low, does anyone have any experience with a mod that you can automatically repair rover wheels without an engineer? Thanks so much!

I have not heard of such a mod... But in a pinch you could probably fix this by editing your save file. Or by using the cheat menu to teleport a manned spacecraft to Duna, repairing the rovers, and then teleporting the manned craft back to Kerbin (and pretend it never existed).
